title: Getting started
text: ICD-10-PCS codes composed seven alphanumeric characters. character contains 34 possible values. seven characters make complete code specific meanings vary 17 sections manual. value represents specific option general character definition. 10 digits (0-9) 24 letters (-H, J-N, P-Z) may used character. letters O used avoid confusion digits 0 1.

title: Getting started
text: character axis classification specifies information procedure performed. Within defined code range, character specifies type information axis classification. example, fifth axis classification specifies Approach sections 0 4 7 9 system.
code: tibble(   axis = 1:7,   name = c('Section',               'Body System',               'Root Operation',               'Body Part',               'Approach',               'Device',               'Qualifier')) |>    gt() |>    opt_table_font(font = google_font(name = "Rubik")) |>    opt_table_lines(extent = "all") |>    opt_all_caps()

title: Getting started
code: sections() #> # A tibble: 17 × 4 #>     axis name    code  label                                                 #>    <int> <chr>   <chr> <chr>                                                 #>  1     1 Section 0     Medical and Surgical                                  #>  2     1 Section 1     Obstetrics                                            #>  3     1 Section 2     Placement                                             #>  4     1 Section 3     Administration                                        #>  5     1 Section 4     Measurement and Monitoring                            #>  6     1 Section 5     Extracorporeal or Systemic Assistance and Performance #>  7     1 Section 6     Extracorporeal or Systemic Therapies                  #>  8     1 Section 7     Osteopathic                                           #>  9     1 Section 8     Other Procedures                                      #> 10     1 Section 9     Chiropractic                                          #> 11     1 Section B     Imaging                                               #> 12     1 Section C     Nuclear Medicine                                      #> 13     1 Section D     Radiation Therapy                                     #> 14     1 Section F     Physical Rehabilitation and Diagnostic Audiology      #> 15     1 Section G     Mental Health                                         #> 16     1 Section H     Substance Abuse Treatment                             #> 17     1 Section X     New Technology sections()[c('code', 'label')] |>    gt() |>    opt_table_font(font = google_font(name = "Rubik")) |>    cols_align(align = "center", columns = code) |>   tab_style(style = list(cell_fill(color = "lightgray", alpha = 0.5),                           cell_text(weight = "bold")),              locations = cells_body(columns = code)) |>    opt_all_caps() |>    opt_align_table_header(align = "left") |>   tab_header(title = md("**ICD-10-PCS** Sections"))

title: Getting started
code: systems() #> # A tibble: 114 × 4 #>     axis name        code  label                                     #>    <int> <chr>       <chr> <chr>                                     #>  1     2 Body System 00    Central Nervous System and Cranial Nerves #>  2     2 Body System 01    Peripheral Nervous System                 #>  3     2 Body System 02    Heart and Great Vessels                   #>  4     2 Body System 03    Upper Arteries                            #>  5     2 Body System 04    Lower Arteries                            #>  6     2 Body System 05    Upper Veins                               #>  7     2 Body System 06    Lower Veins                               #>  8     2 Body System 07    Lymphatic and Hemic Systems               #>  9     2 Body System 08    Eye                                       #> 10     2 Body System 09    Ear, Nose, Sinus                          #> # ℹ 104 more rows

title: Getting started
code: # BR Imaging, Axial Skeleton, Except Skull and Facial Bones # C9 Nuclear Medicine Ear, Nose, Mouth and Throat # D9 Radiation Therapy Ear, Nose, Mouth and Throat # G Mental Health # H Substance Abuse Treatment tables("gz") |> tidyr::unnest(codes) #> Error in `read_qs()`: #> ! The package "qs" is required.

title: Getting started
code: definitions() |>    summarise(n = n(),              .by = c(code, section, axis, axis_name)) #> Error in `read_qs()`: #> ! The package "qs" is required. definitions() |>   filter(     code == "0"      ,axis == "3"      ,label == "Bypass"     ) #> Error in `read_qs()`: #> ! The package "qs" is required.

title: Getting started
code:
pcs("0016070") |> gt(rowname_col = "axis") |> opt_table_font(font = google_font(name = "Rubik")) |> cols_align(align = "center", columns = c(axis, code)) |> tab_style(style = list(cell_fill(color = "lightgray", alpha = 0.5), cell_text(weight = "bold")), locations = cells_body(columns = code)) |> opt_all_caps() |> opt_align_table_header(align = "left") |> tab_header(title = html("ICD-10-PCS 2024
"), subtitle = html("SECTION: 0 Medical and Surgical
SYSTEM: 0 Central Nervous System and Cranial Nerves
OPERATION: 1 Bypass

")) |> sub_missing(missing_text = "") #> Error in `read_qs()`: #> ! The package "qs" is required.

title: Authors and Citation

title: Authors and Citation
text: Bruce (2024). procedural: Tidy ICD-10-PCS interface. R package version 0.0.0.9000, https://andrewallenbruce.github.io/procedural/.
code: @Manual{,   title = {procedural: Tidy ICD-10-PCS interface},   author = {Andrew Bruce},   year = {2024},   note = {R package version 0.0.0.9000},   url = {https://andrewallenbruce.github.io/procedural/}, }

title: Tidy ICD-10-PCS interface
code: # install.packages("pak") pak::pak("andrewallenbruce/procedural")

title: Tidy ICD-10-PCS interface
code: library(procedural)

title: Tidy ICD-10-PCS interface
code: sections() #> # A tibble: 17 × 4 #>     axis name    code  label                                                 #>    <int> <chr>   <chr> <chr>                                                 #>  1     1 Section 0     Medical and Surgical                                  #>  2     1 Section 1     Obstetrics                                            #>  3     1 Section 2     Placement                                             #>  4     1 Section 3     Administration                                        #>  5     1 Section 4     Measurement and Monitoring                            #>  6     1 Section 5     Extracorporeal or Systemic Assistance and Performance #>  7     1 Section 6     Extracorporeal or Systemic Therapies                  #>  8     1 Section 7     Osteopathic                                           #>  9     1 Section 8     Other Procedures                                      #> 10     1 Section 9     Chiropractic                                          #> 11     1 Section B     Imaging                                               #> 12     1 Section C     Nuclear Medicine                                      #> 13     1 Section D     Radiation Therapy                                     #> 14     1 Section F     Physical Rehabilitation and Diagnostic Audiology      #> 15     1 Section G     Mental Health                                         #> 16     1 Section H     Substance Abuse Treatment                             #> 17     1 Section X     New Technology

title: Tidy ICD-10-PCS interface
code: systems() #> # A tibble: 114 × 4 #>     axis name        code  label                                     #>    <int> <chr>       <chr> <chr>                                     #>  1     2 Body System 00    Central Nervous System and Cranial Nerves #>  2     2 Body System 01    Peripheral Nervous System                 #>  3     2 Body System 02    Heart and Great Vessels                   #>  4     2 Body System 03    Upper Arteries                            #>  5     2 Body System 04    Lower Arteries                            #>  6     2 Body System 05    Upper Veins                               #>  7     2 Body System 06    Lower Veins                               #>  8     2 Body System 07    Lymphatic and Hemic Systems               #>  9     2 Body System 08    Eye                                       #> 10     2 Body System 09    Ear, Nose, Sinus                          #> # ℹ 104 more rows

title: Tidy ICD-10-PCS interface
code: tables("00X") #> # A tibble: 1 × 5 #>   section system table description                                    codes      #>   <chr>   <chr>  <chr> <chr>                                          <list>     #> 1 0       00     00X   Medical and Surgical, Central Nervous System … <spc_tbl_>

title: Tidy ICD-10-PCS interface
code: definitions() #> # A tibble: 917 × 8 #>    code  section           axis  axis_name label definition explanation includes #>    <chr> <chr>             <chr> <chr>     <chr> <chr>      <chr>       <chr>    #>  1 0     Medical and Surg… 3     Operation Alte… Modifying… Principal … Face li… #>  2 0     Medical and Surg… 3     Operation Bypa… Altering … Rerouting … Coronar… #>  3 0     Medical and Surg… 3     Operation Chan… Taking ou… All CHANGE… Urinary… #>  4 0     Medical and Surg… 3     Operation Cont… Stopping,… <NA>        Control… #>  5 0     Medical and Surg… 3     Operation Crea… Putting i… Used for g… Creatio… #>  6 0     Medical and Surg… 3     Operation Dest… Physical … None of th… Fulgura… #>  7 0     Medical and Surg… 3     Operation Deta… Cutting o… The body p… Below k… #>  8 0     Medical and Surg… 3     Operation Dila… Expanding… The orific… Percuta… #>  9 0     Medical and Surg… 3     Operation Divi… Cutting i… All or a p… Spinal … #> 10 0     Medical and Surg… 3     Operation Drai… Taking or… The qualif… Thorace… #> # ℹ 907 more rows

title: Tidy ICD-10-PCS interface
code: pcs("10D20ZZ") #> # A tibble: 7 × 4 #>   axis  name           code  label                           #>   <chr> <chr>          <chr> <chr>                           #> 1 1     Section        1     Obstetrics                      #> 2 2     Body System    0     Pregnancy                       #> 3 3     Root Operation D     Extraction                      #> 4 4     Body Part      2     Products of Conception, Ectopic #> 5 5     Approach       0     Open                            #> 6 6     Device         Z     No Device                       #> 7 7     Qualifier      Z     No Qualifier

title: Tidy ICD-10-PCS interface
text: Please note provider project released Contributor Code Conduct. contributing project, agree abide terms.

title: Tidy ICD-10-PCS interface
text: project primarily maintained Andrew Bruce. authors may occasionally assist duties.

title: ICD-10-PCS Axes — axes
code: axes(x)

title: ICD-10-PCS Axes — axes
text: x ICD-10-PCS section character, alphanumeric code length 1. NULL (default), returns 17 sections.

title: ICD-10-PCS Axes — axes
code: if (FALSE) { # interactive() axes() axes("0") axes("2") axes("X") }

title: ICD-10-PCS Definitions — definitions
code: definitions()

title: ICD-10-PCS Definitions — definitions
code: if (FALSE) { # interactive() definitions() }

what: Pivot data frame to long format for easy printing — long
title: Pivot data frame to long format for easy printing — long
text: Pivot data frame long format easy printing

title: Pivot data frame to long format for easy printing — long
code: long(df, cols = dplyr::everything())

title: Pivot data frame to long format for easy printing — long
text: df data frame cols columns pivot long, default dplyr::everything()

title: ICD-10-PCS Root Operations — operations
code: operations()

title: ICD-10-PCS Root Operations — operations
code: if (FALSE) { # interactive() operations() }

title: Look up ICD-10-PCS Codes — pcs
code: pcs(x)

title: Look up ICD-10-PCS Codes — pcs
code: if (FALSE) { # interactive() pcs("0G9000Z") pcs("0016070") pcs("2W0UX0Z") pcs("2W20X4Z") pcs("2W10X7Z") pcs("2W10X6Z") pcs("2W1HX7Z") }

title: ICD-10-PCS Sections — sections
code: sections(x = NULL)

title: ICD-10-PCS Sections — sections
text: x ICD-10-PCS section character, alphanumeric code length 1. NULL (default), returns 17 sections.

title: ICD-10-PCS Sections — sections
code: if (FALSE) { # interactive() sections() sections("0") sections("2") sections("X") }

title: ICD-10-PCS Body Systems — systems
code: systems()

title: ICD-10-PCS Body Systems — systems
code: if (FALSE) { # interactive() systems() }

title: ICD-10-PCS Tables — tables
code: tables(x = NULL)

title: ICD-10-PCS Tables — tables
text: x 1 3-character string representing ICD-10-PCS table. NULL (default), returns 895 tables.

title: ICD-10-PCS Tables — tables
code: if (FALSE) { # interactive() tables() tables("0") tables("00") tables("00X") }
